history.content:
Hi,
I am a senior student who intends to double major in CS, I have background in CS61A, CS61B, CS70, and one upper-division CS class at the end of this fall. I wonder can I declare the CS major at the end of this semester? (I remember the qualification for declaring CS major is CS61A, CS61b, CS70 after 2015). 

BTW, My schedule for next semester is one design class (CS 160), one theory class (CS170), and EECS16A. And then take one of CS61c / EECS16B in summer and one of them in 2022 fall. Any pieces of advice for my rough plan? TIA!

ALSO, due to I am a senior now I have to extend one semester to 2022 fall. When should I apply for an extension and who should I ask for?

Appreciate any advices and responses!!! TIA!
history.subject: Quick logistics questions
